item.title: CVE-2023-28777|2024-08-02T13:51:38.204Z -- learndash -- learndash%20lms
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in LearnDash LearnDash LMS allows SQL Injection.This issue affects LearnDash LMS: from n/a through 4.5.3.
